CustomField.description: The user who is responsible for the onboarding review, and the decider of the CSQ Pre-Approval Process. This field is auto populated to the user Id who changed Pre-Approval status to 'Under Onboarding Review'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The user who is responsible for the onboarding review, and the decider of the CSQ Pre-Approval Process. This field is auto populated to the user Id who changed Pre-Approval status to 'Under Onboarding Review'.
CustomField.label: Pre-Approver
